implementation.title: Our Delivery Process
implementation.description: Systematic approach that ensures your automation projects deliver results without disrupting your business
implementation.subtitle: Systematic approach that ensures your automation projects deliver results without disrupting your business

phase1.title: Discovery & Risk Assessment
phase1.description: Comprehensive analysis of your current systems and workflows with no commitment required. We identify automation opportunities and assess risks before any implementation begins.
phase1.outcome: Clear roadmap with identified opportunities and protected investments

phase2.title: Strategic Planning & Architecture
phase2.description: Design the technical architecture and implementation strategy based on discovery findings. We create detailed blueprints with fallback plans before any development begins.
phase2.outcome: Technical architecture blueprint with defined success metrics

phase3.title: Controlled Implementation & Testing
phase3.description: Build and deploy automation systems in a controlled environment with comprehensive testing. We implement with continuous monitoring and rollback capabilities to ensure zero business disruption.
phase3.outcome: Fully functional automation systems validated through testing

phase4.title: Launch & Team Training
phase4.description: Full system deployment with comprehensive team training and knowledge transfer. Your team becomes autonomous with the new automation systems through hands-on training and documentation.
phase4.outcome: Fully operational automation system with confident, trained team

collaboration.title: Connect Your Business Tools & Automate Workflows
collaboration.description: Connect your favorite business tools and create powerful automations that save 20+ hours per week. We handle all the technical complexity for you.

feature1.title: Connect 1000+ Business Apps
feature1.text: From Slack to Google Sheets, Discord to Notion - automate workflows across all your tools.

feature2.title: Enterprise-Grade Automation
feature2.text: We design and implement custom workflows tailored to your business processes and requirements.

feature3.title: Real-Time Data Sync
feature3.text: Keep all your apps synchronized automatically. No more manual data entry or copy-paste.

companyLogos.tagline: Automate workflows across your favorite business apps

messages.success: Thank you for your interest! Your inquiry has been successfully submitted.
messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

success.bundleRecommendation: Based on your interest in our website bundles, we recommend booking a 45-minute digital strategy session to discuss your project requirements in detail.
success.generalRecommendation: We recommend booking a 30-minute automation audit to explore how we can help streamline your business operations.

booking.title: Schedule Your Strategy Call
booking.subtitle: Choose the session that best fits your needs and book a time that works for you

duration30.title: 30-Minute Call
duration30.description: Perfect for exploring automation opportunities and getting expert advice on streamlining your business operations.

duration45.title: 45-Minute Call
duration45.description: Ideal for in-depth discussion of website bundle projects, technical requirements, and comprehensive digital strategy planning.

cookieBanner.title: We value your privacy
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. You can manage your preferences or learn more in our

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include session management, security, and basic functionality.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies track your activity across websites to show you relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness.
marketing.details: Facebook Pixel, LinkedIn Insight, Google Ads

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, like remembering your preferences and settings.
functional.details: Language settings, theme preferences, form progress

websiteBundles.title: Complete Digital Solutions
websiteBundles.subtitle: Professional web development combined with intelligent automation systems to accelerate business growth and operational efficiency

foundation.title: Foundation Bundle
foundation.subtitle: Business Website + Core Automations
foundation.description: Professional web presence with essential automation workflows to streamline customer interactions and lead management for service-based businesses.
foundation.idealFor: Service businesses, consultants, agencies, professional services

capabilities.1: Contact form automation with instant notifications
capabilities.2: Lead capture workflows and email sequences
capabilities.4: Basic CRM integration for lead management

growth.title: Growth Bundle
growth.subtitle: E-commerce + Marketing Automation
growth.description: Complete online store with intelligent automation systems for inventory, orders, and customer lifecycle management to maximize sales and retention.
growth.idealFor: Product businesses, online retailers, physical stores going digital

capabilities.0: Full e-commerce store with payment processing
capabilities.1: Automated inventory management and low-stock alerts
capabilities.2: Order processing workflows and fulfillment automation
capabilities.3: Customer email campaigns and abandoned cart recovery

dominator.title: Dominator Bundle
dominator.subtitle: Custom Web App + Advanced Automation
dominator.description: Enterprise-grade web application development with custom automation architecture. Every project is uniquely scoped based on your technical requirements and business objectives through detailed consultation.
dominator.idealFor: SaaS startups, tech companies, businesses with complex operations

capabilities.0: Custom web application development tailored to your requirements
capabilities.1: Scalable user authentication, roles, and permission systems
capabilities.2: Multi-system workflow orchestration and API integrations
capabilities.3: Enterprise-grade analytics dashboards with real-time data

bottomCta.description: Ready to transform your business with professional web development and intelligent automation? Let's discuss your project requirements and technical objectives.

aiServices.title: AI Automation Systems
aiServices.subtitle: Multi-platform automation architectures using open-source orchestration, AI language models, and voice synthesis technologies for workflow optimization

leadGeneration.title: Lead Generation Systems
leadGeneration.subtitle: Multi-Source Data + AI-Powered Prospecting
leadGeneration.description: Automated prospect identification and qualification systems using multi-source data enrichment and AI-powered outreach workflows. Advanced targeting algorithms combined with intelligent contact sequencing for consistent business development.

salesAutomation.title: Sales Process Automation
salesAutomation.subtitle: AI Proposals + CRM Integration
salesAutomation.description: Complete sales process automation with AI-powered proposal generation, lead scoring, and CRM workflows. Our system creates dynamic proposals and manages your entire sales pipeline automatically.

capabilities.0: Intelligent proposal generation with dynamic pricing
capabilities.1: Advanced lead scoring models with automation

recruitment.title: Recruitment Automation
recruitment.subtitle: AI-Powered Candidate Processing + ATS Integration
recruitment.description: AI-powered CV parsing and candidate scoring with automated job posting across multiple platforms. Streamline your entire recruitment pipeline from application to hire with intelligent automation.
recruitment.outcome: Streamlined recruitment pipeline with reduced time-to-hire

capabilities.0: AI-powered CV parsing and candidate data extraction
capabilities.1: Automated candidate scoring and ranking algorithms
capabilities.2: Multi-platform job posting automation (LinkedIn, Indeed, etc.)
capabilities.3: Interview scheduling and calendar coordination workflows
capabilities.4: Automated candidate communication and follow-up sequences

voiceAI.title: Voice & AI Agent Systems
voiceAI.subtitle: AI-Powered + 24/7 Multilingual Support
voiceAI.description: 24/7 AI voice agents with 31+ language support for customer service, appointment booking, and sales support. Multi-platform integration provides natural conversations that feel human while handling routine tasks automatically.

contentSystems.title: AI Content & UGC Systems
contentSystems.subtitle: AI-Powered + Character-Consistent Branding
contentSystems.description: AI-powered content creation with character-consistent UGC campaigns. Generate blog posts, social content, and marketing materials while maintaining perfect brand consistency across all channels.

capabilities.0: AI-driven content creation with brand algorithms

automationDashboard.title: Automation Intelligence Platform
automationDashboard.subtitle: Custom Dashboard + Complete Workflow Control
automationDashboard.description: Custom-built web dashboard that centralizes all your business automations in one control center. Real-time monitoring, performance analytics, and complete control over all automated workflows with custom business intelligence reporting.

capabilities.0: Custom dashboard development with real-time monitoring
capabilities.1: Centralized control panel for all n8n automations
capabilities.2: Business performance analytics and KPI tracking

capabilities.4: Custom reporting and business intelligence integration
